title: Count Emicho and his Crusader Army entered Mainz and massacred Jews.
text: Count Emicho and his Crusader Army entered Mainz and massacred Jews.

title: Richard III of Capua is anointed as Prince two weeks before his untimely death.
text: Richard III of Capua is anointed as Prince two weeks before his untimely death.

title: Malcolm IV becomes King of Scotland.
text: Malcolm IV becomes King of Scotland.

title: John is crowned King of England.
text: John is crowned King of England.

title: Manchu regent Dorgon defeats rebel leader Li Zicheng of the Shun dynasty at the Battle of Shanhai Pass, allowing the Manchus to enter and conquer the capital city of Beijing.
text: Manchu regent Dorgon defeats rebel leader Li Zicheng of the Shun dynasty at the Battle of Shanhai Pass, allowing the Manchus to enter and conquer the capital city of Beijing.

title: Tsar Peter the Great founds the city of Saint Petersburg.
text: Tsar Peter the Great founds the city of Saint Petersburg.

title: The Battle of Oulart Hill takes place in Wexford, Ireland.
text: The Battle of Oulart Hill takes place in Wexford, Ireland.

title: War of the Second Coalition: Austrian forces defeat the French at Winterthur, Switzerland.
text: War of the Second Coalition: Austrian forces defeat the French at Winterthur, Switzerland.

title: War of 1812: In Canada, American forces capture Fort George.
text: War of 1812: In Canada, American forces capture Fort George.

title: Giuseppe Garibaldi begins his attack on Palermo, Sicily, as part of the Italian unification.
text: Giuseppe Garibaldi begins his attack on Palermo, Sicily, as part of the Italian unification.

title: American Civil War: First Assault on the Confederate works at the Siege of Port Hudson.
text: American Civil War: First Assault on the Confederate works at the Siege of Port Hudson.

title: The first group of Dorsland trekkers under the leadership of Gert Alberts leaves Pretoria.
text: The first group of Dorsland trekkers under the leadership of Gert Alberts leaves Pretoria.

title: Alexander III is crowned Tsar of Russia.
text: Alexander III is crowned Tsar of Russia.

title: The F4-strength 1896 St. Louis–East St. Louis tornado hits in St. Louis, Missouri, and East St. Louis, Illinois, killing at least 255 people and causing $2.9 billion in damage (1997 US dollars).
text: The F4-strength 1896 St. Louis–East St. Louis tornado hits in St. Louis, Missouri, and East St. Louis, Illinois, killing at least 255 people and causing $2.9 billion in damage (1997 US dollars).

title: Russo-Japanese War: The Battle of Tsushima begins.
text: Russo-Japanese War: The Battle of Tsushima begins.

title: Pope Benedict XV promulgates the 1917 Code of Canon Law, the first comprehensive codification of Catholic canon law in the legal history of the Catholic Church.
text: Pope Benedict XV promulgates the 1917 Code of Canon Law, the first comprehensive codification of Catholic canon law in the legal history of the Catholic Church.

title: The NC-4 aircraft arrives in Lisbon after completing the first transatlantic flight.
text: The NC-4 aircraft arrives in Lisbon after completing the first transatlantic flight.

title: The Ford Motor Company ceases manufacture of the Ford Model T and begins to retool plants to make the Ford Model A.
text: The Ford Motor Company ceases manufacture of the Ford Model T and begins to retool plants to make the Ford Model A.

title: The 1,046 feet (319 m) Chrysler Building in New York City, the tallest man-made structure at the time, opens to the public.
text: The 1,046 feet (319 m) Chrysler Building in New York City, the tallest man-made structure at the time, opens to the public.

title: New Deal: The U.S. Federal Securities Act is signed into law requiring the registration of securities with the Federal Trade Commission.
text: New Deal: The U.S. Federal Securities Act is signed into law requiring the registration of securities with the Federal Trade Commission.

title: The Walt Disney Company releases the cartoon Three Little Pigs, with its hit song "Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?"
text: The Walt Disney Company releases the cartoon Three Little Pigs, with its hit song "Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?"

title: New Deal: The Supreme Court of the United States declares the National Industrial Recovery Act to be unconstitutional in A.L.A. Schechter Poultry Corp. v. United States, (295 U.S. 495).
text: New Deal: The Supreme Court of the United States declares the National Industrial Recovery Act to be unconstitutional in A.L.A. Schechter Poultry Corp. v. United States, (295 U.S. 495).

title: In California, the Golden Gate Bridge opens to pedestrian traffic, creating a vital link between San Francisco and Marin County, California.
text: In California, the Golden Gate Bridge opens to pedestrian traffic, creating a vital link between San Francisco and Marin County, California.

title: World War II: In the Le Paradis massacre, 99 soldiers from a Royal Norfolk Regiment unit are shot after surrendering to German troops; two survive.
text: World War II: In the Le Paradis massacre, 99 soldiers from a Royal Norfolk Regiment unit are shot after surrendering to German troops; two survive.

title: World War II: U.S. President Franklin D. Roosevelt proclaims an "unlimited national emergency".
text: World War II: U.S. President Franklin D. Roosevelt proclaims an "unlimited national emergency".

title: World War II: The German battleship Bismarck is sunk in the North Atlantic killing almost 2,100 men.
text: World War II: The German battleship Bismarck is sunk in the North Atlantic killing almost 2,100 men.

title: World War II: In Operation Anthropoid, Reinhard Heydrich is fatally wounded in Prague; he dies of his injuries eight days later.
text: World War II: In Operation Anthropoid, Reinhard Heydrich is fatally wounded in Prague; he dies of his injuries eight days later.

title: First flight of the McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II.
text: First flight of the McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II.

title: In Turkey, a military coup removes President Celâl Bayar and the rest of the democratic government from office.
text: In Turkey, a military coup removes President Celâl Bayar and the rest of the democratic government from office.

title: The Centralia mine fire is ignited in the town's landfill above a coal mine.
text: The Centralia mine fire is ignited in the town's landfill above a coal mine.

title: Vietnam War: American warships begin the first bombardment of National Liberation Front targets within South Vietnam.
text: Vietnam War: American warships begin the first bombardment of National Liberation Front targets within South Vietnam.

title: Australians vote in favor of a constitutional referendum granting the Australian government the power to make laws to benefit Indigenous Australians and to count them in the national census.
text: Australians vote in favor of a constitutional referendum granting the Australian government the power to make laws to benefit Indigenous Australians and to count them in the national census.

title: The U.S. Navy aircraft carrier USS John F. Kennedy is launched by Jacqueline Kennedy and her daughter Caroline.
text: The U.S. Navy aircraft carrier USS John F. Kennedy is launched by Jacqueline Kennedy and her daughter Caroline.

title: The Dahlerau train disaster, the worst railway accident in West Germany, kills 46 people and injures 25 near Wuppertal.
text: The Dahlerau train disaster, the worst railway accident in West Germany, kills 46 people and injures 25 near Wuppertal.

title: Pakistani forces massacre over 200 civilians, mostly Bengali Hindus, in the Bagbati massacre.
text: Pakistani forces massacre over 200 civilians, mostly Bengali Hindus, in the Bagbati massacre.

title: Dibbles Bridge coach crash near Grassington, in North Yorkshire, England, kills 33 – the highest ever death toll in a road accident in the United Kingdom.
text: Dibbles Bridge coach crash near Grassington, in North Yorkshire, England, kills 33 – the highest ever death toll in a road accident in the United Kingdom.

title: The Gwangju Massacre: Airborne and army troops of South Korea retake the city of Gwangju from civil militias, killing at least 207 and possibly many more.
text: The Gwangju Massacre: Airborne and army troops of South Korea retake the city of Gwangju from civil militias, killing at least 207 and possibly many more.

title: First Chechen War: the Russian President Boris Yeltsin meets with Chechnyan rebels for the first time and negotiates a cease-fire.
text: First Chechen War: the Russian President Boris Yeltsin meets with Chechnyan rebels for the first time and negotiates a cease-fire.

title: The 1997 Central Texas tornado outbreak occurs, spawning multiple tornadoes in Central Texas, including the F5 that killed 27 in Jarrell.
text: The 1997 Central Texas tornado outbreak occurs, spawning multiple tornadoes in Central Texas, including the F5 that killed 27 in Jarrell.

title: Oklahoma City bombing: Michael Fortier is sentenced to 12 years in prison and fined $200,000 for failing to warn authorities about the terrorist plot.
text: Oklahoma City bombing: Michael Fortier is sentenced to 12 years in prison and fined $200,000 for failing to warn authorities about the terrorist plot.

title: Members of the Islamist separatist group Abu Sayyaf seize twenty hostages from an affluent island resort on Palawan in the Philippines; the hostage crisis would not be resolved until June 2002.
text: Members of the Islamist separatist group Abu Sayyaf seize twenty hostages from an affluent island resort on Palawan in the Philippines; the hostage crisis would not be resolved until June 2002.

title: The 6.4 Mw Yogyakarta earthquake shakes central Java with an MSK intensity of VIII (Damaging), leaving more than 5,700 dead and 37,000 injured.
text: The 6.4 Mw Yogyakarta earthquake shakes central Java with an MSK intensity of VIII (Damaging), leaving more than 5,700 dead and 37,000 injured.

title: Barack Obama is the first president of United States to visit Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and meet Hibakusha.
text: Barack Obama is the first president of United States to visit Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and meet Hibakusha.

title: 2018 Maryland flood event occurs throughout the Patapsco Valley causing 1 death and an destroying the entire first floors of buildings in Main St, Ellicott City and causing cars to overturn.
